text: Gerd Langguth (18 May 1946 in Wertheim - 12 May 2013 in Cologne) was a German professor of political science at the University of Bonn and the author of biographies of Angela Merkel and Horst Köhler. Langguth studied at Dietrich Bonhoeffer School. He died in 2013, aged 66.Publizist und Politikexperte Langguth ist tot From 1976 to 1980 he was a member of the Bundestag on behalf of the CDU. ==References== ==Other websites== * Personal Web site Category:1946 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:Academics of the University of Bonn Category:German political scientists Category:Politicians from Baden-Württemberg Category:Politicians of the Christian Democratic Union of Germany
title: Gerd Langguth
